name: Evolve Component Library | Karan Kapoor
description:
--New Features Update --


Hello Everyone,


In this update, the number of component variants has reduced as component properties were launched recently at Figma Config. This means that all the previous components are intact but can be accessed from less number of variants.


Evolve is slowly turning into a self-sustaining library and a design system


I've tried to cover the higher-level components you can use for quick mockups and overall Designs also.


If you have any suggestions or want to contribute to the library, write to me at notkarankapoor@gmail.com.


------------------------------------------------------------


Updates in this version:

  1. Library updated with the new Component properties
  2. Simplification of components like tooltip
  3. Rounded corner radius changed to 12
